title: Average per game attendance English Premier League 2018/19
summary: Overall Average attendance has increased over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Maximum Average attendance, about 35903.0 was reported at Year 2012/13
Minimum Average attendance about 34646.0 was reached at Year 2011/12
min_summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
mid_summary: Overall Average attendance has increased over the Year.
